reviews.author: Simon P
reviews.review: Excellent rental property. Manager is awesome and the apartments are well appointed. Very positive stay here.

reviews.author: Hayden Anderson
reviews.review: Amazing management and very well maintained property. Nice appliances and building materials were used. A little drafty at times but nothing a heater can't fix. Love this place!

reviews.author: Stephanie Rasmussen
reviews.review: Very friendly manager, beautiful and well-lit apartments, a fenced off-leash area for dogs, and  an indoor heated dog wash station! The two service requests I have had to put in were resolved within 24 hours, even with having to call out an electrician.

reviews.author: Julian McAllister
reviews.review: Good but it could be better

ownerResponse.text: Hi Julian. Thank you for your review. Please let me know what I can do to make living here at Cedar Grove better for you. As you know, my door is always open for you and Sharon.
